solution_line_template: The ash cloud spread out {eruption_height} * {diameter_multiplier} = <<{eruption_height}*{diameter_multiplier}={ash_cloud_diameter}>>{ash_cloud_diameter} feet in diameter.
The radius is half the diameter, so the ash cloud had a radius of {ash_cloud_diameter} / {radius_divisor} = <<{ash_cloud_diameter}/{radius_divisor}={ash_cloud_radius}>>{ash_cloud_radius} feet.
